message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500. This is a great deal, and I'm confident you won't find a better price anywhere else.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not quite ready to accept your offer of $8000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $9000. This is a great compromise, and I'm confident you'll find it's a fair price.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand that you're getting close to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll offer the product to you for $8750. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8200. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're getting too close to the minimum price I'm willing to accept, Bob. I'll make one more concession. I'll offer the product to you for $8400. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I think it's still a great deal for both of us.

I understand that you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still trying to get as close as possible to my target price. I'm willing to pay $8100 for the product. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?

I understand that you're trying to get as close as possible to your target price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I'm not willing to go any lower than this. I'll offer the product to you for $8150. This is my final offer, and I think it's a great compromise.
I appreciate all the concessions you've made, Alice. I'm willing to meet you at my target price of $8000. Is that something you'd be willing to accept?
